snippet: Sentencing hearings for the two in the kidnapping and killing of Muhammad Abu Khdeir, who was bludgeoned and burned to death in 2014, will begin in mid-January.
abstract: Israeli court finds two Jewish teenagers guilty in connection with July 2014 kidnapping and murder of 16-year-old Palestinian Muhammad Abu Khdeir; conviction of youths, which will be reviewed by social worker before it is made formal, does little to quell rage of Palestinians, or restore their faith in justice system.
lead_paragraph: Sentencing hearings for the two in the kidnapping and killing of Muhammad Abu Khdeir, who was bludgeoned and burned to death in 2014, will begin in mid-January.

headline.main: Two Jewish Teenagers Found Guilty of Murdering Palestinian, 16
headline.print_headline: Two Convicted in Jerusalem of Murdering Palestinian, 16
